metadata.title: CVE-2017-9869 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: The II_step_one function in layer2.c in mpglib, as used in libmpgdecoder.ain LAME 3.99.5 and other products, allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (buffer over-read and application crash) via a craftedaudio file.

criterions.comment: lame package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
